comment: I'm a conservative, not a libertarian. It's high time we stop trying to police the entire f***ing world. We can't afford it anymore. Why do you think the deficit is so bloody high? How many more Americans have to die because of neo-con and neo-liberal masturbation fantasies? I want American taxpayers' money spent on AMERICA not the rest of the f***ing world.
